description: Spring field beans sown in spring, given same organic manure and fertilizer as wheat. Grown as part of the wheat>potato>beans rotation on Sections 2, 4 and 7, 1968-1978.
Winter field beans sown in autumn, no FYM or fertilizer N applied. Grown as part of the wheat>wheat>oats>wheat>beans rotation on Sections 2-5 and 7, 2018 onwards.

Potatoes grown as part of the wheat>potato>beans rotation on Sections 2, 4 and 7 between 1968-1996. Received the same fertilizer applications as wheat, except no autumn N applied to strips 17-18. Chitted seed was usually planted in April. The crop was usually harvested in September, which is earlier than normal, to allow timely drilling of winter wheat, hence the potato yields tend to be lower than might be expected.
Winter wheat, sown in the autumn/winter, except in 2015 and 2020 when spring wheat was sown, as wet conditions in the autumn/winter prevented the sowing of winter wheat.
Spring wheat, sown in the spring of 2015 and 2020, instead of the usual winter wheat, as wet conditions in the autumn/winter prevented the sowing of the usual winter wheat variety
